Reviews.Title: Great watch
Reviews.Author: Cowboy/Packer fan
Reviews.Content: Just got it today 03/27/2013.So far .....so good...I am very happy with the watch as of now..will comment again in a few weeks.The phone signal works great with my service provider. People I call hears me Great, but its kinda hard to hear them without using the ear piece or Bluetooth. Watch did come with a stylus, witch makes it easier to stroll through phone..it is touch scream, but I have Big Hands. One (-) comment: the numbers on the phone could be Bigger, kinda hard to see the numbers to dial a call. I guess once I get use to the layout ...I would be fine.P.S. look for future comments...I will keep u all posted..Thad
